page.title: 15LIFE OUTSIDE SCHOOL
page.content: {SATURDAY MORNING TV-AM and then a bus ride into town for a milk-shake and french-fries at Macdonalds...Tea and toast for breakfast, into town to get a new BMX bike then spaghetti for lunch ...fishfingers, eggs and beans for breakfast, to the bank for mum to pay her bills then a trip to town to look at clothes in C and A and records... to Polish school from ten till three...by coach to Scarborough for a day on the beach.. rollerboots for my birthday present and we went on the Matlock cable-cars...{AFTER SCHOOL We go to Louise's house for tea then our gymnastics class...we play snooker and pool at the boys' club...I have a guitar lesson, playing classical and popular tunes...We have a pub and at eleven at night I help put the chairs up, have a drink of coke and watch TV.
